title: Atalantian Zac  * Please Riot give Zac some love*
body:
I have been talking to some people regarding the fact that poor Zac is still left with no skin and even though I do not play him I feel something needs to be done about this lack of care to a champ.
I know Riot on countless situations have said they have not provided one due to the particals ect not matching up right ect in testing blah blah. 

Why not go the Atlantian Skin route like you did with Fizz and Syndra.
The water textures you used for Syndras's Balls could be applied to the overall look of Zac and do very well I think! 
When he does he wind up to go in a direction it could look like a tidal wave or something. When he splits himself ect would just look like splashing water and water globs.

Anyway just an idea for Riot if they do in fact read this stuff :)

replies.body: Zac's pick rate is very low. Riot is still a company that has to look at what profit they can look to turn pouring time and money into developing new skins. Look at the new skins coming out, Katarina, Nidalee, Satan, etc, champions that are popular and common picks, especially with the rise of Jungle Nidalee. Zac is not a popular pick, so creating a new skin for him would not be very profitable. Whereas I just saw the PBE news and there's another Vayne skin around the corner, who is funnily enough one of the most popular champs at the moment. My point is that Riot isn't going to put a lot of money into champs unless they're in the meta or starting to become popular again.
